quotes: This was I think in 1995. I went home and thought hard about it and was entirely persuaded.
In the Fall of 1995, I taught development to Esther, Eliana La Ferrara, Jishnu Das, Asim Khwaja, Stuti Khemani, and Chris Spohr, all whom have made major contributions to the field.

organizations.name: Northwestern
quotes: Kaivan Munshi and Maitreesh Ghatak, two of my earliest PhD students, were my accomplices in this enterprise, which Chris Udry at Northwestern and Rob Townsend at Chicago were also pursuing.

organizations.name: Chicago
quotes: Kaivan Munshi and Maitreesh Ghatak, two of my earliest PhD students, were my accomplices in this enterprise, which Chris Udry at Northwestern and Rob Townsend at Chicago were also pursuing.

organizations.name: MIT
quotes: I somehow persuaded Michael Kremer, who had just finished his PhD and joined us at MIT as a brilliant young macroeconomist, to take it on.

roles.title: research assistant
quotes: In a little while Esther asked me if she could work for me as a research assistant, which is how I really got to know her and learnt to appreciate the way she, better than anyone I know, combines deep understanding of theory and empirical techniques with intense practicality, pitch-perfect common sense, infinite energy and boundless generosity.
